entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Overcast. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Overcast. Risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
